## CRAN packages

- [`riskclustr`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/riskclustr/index.html) (author), a package of functions for the study of etiologic heterogeneity

- [`gtsummary`](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gtsummary/index.html) (contributor) a package for creating presentation-ready summary tables

## Github packages

- [`ppseq`](http://www.emilyzabor.com/ppseq/), a package of functions to design clinical trials with sequential predictive probability monitoring for futility

- [`ezfun`](https://github.com/zabore/ezfun), a package of personal utility functions to generate tables for use in R Markdown reports

- [`condsurv`](https://github.com/zabore/condsurv), a package for conditional survival analysis
